MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Storrington Avenue and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is an underground fault affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.23PM on 19th March 2021.
